data.name: Pan'orama
data.detailed_description:
Build what your imagination tells you!


Pan'orama is a relaxing and soothing puzzle simulation game in which you create amazing landscapes using different types of tiles, but most of all by discovering the connections between them and finding unique combinations.

Sculpt your own world




Freedom to create is the ultimate goal of Pan'orama! Shape the terrain, carve it in stone, change the topography. Create your own piece of the world. By using tiles of the same type you will level up the ones around.

Complete quests and earn rewards!




Additional areas on the board marked with specific icons will allow you to pursue special goals. Fulfilling the requirements of a given quest will always result in not only a new construction, but also a large pool of additional tiles!

Clean the environment




Sometimes, just like in our world, unfortunately you will find dirty and cluttered places. Fortunately, the proper development of the city will lead to the removal of rubbish, and residents will be able to enjoy fresh and clean air.

Discover and develop structures




The base pool of tiles is not very impressive. Does this mean that we are limited to a field, water, cottage or forest? Nothing could be more wrong! The right connections between the tiles evolve into completely new buildings, creating wonderful diverse cities! Have you discovered them? Great! But it doesn't stop there. Keep trying and you will find methods for their development!

... and last but not least

USE YOUR IMAGINATION !!!




Imagination in Panorama is the most important element you need to create interesting, fascinating, vibrant worlds! Drop your limits and let your fantasia run wild!

data.short_description: Pan'orama is a relaxing and soothing puzzle simulation game in which you create amazing landscapes using different types of tiles, but most of all by discovering the connections between them and finding unique combinations.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 64-bit
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 750 / Radeon HD 7770
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
